name: Copperpix Technologies Inc.
tag_list: augmented-reality, mobile-marketing-applications, location-based-services, advertising, print-media, tv-media, face-recognition
overview:
opperPix Technologies is founded by smartphone and technology industry professionals with a goal to revolutionize the traditional media marketing. Our Augmented Reality mobile applications are aimed to overcome the drawback of current mass media solutions, limited information to consumer and no consumer analytics or feedback. We envision a world that is interactive and rich with useful information without limiting the mobility of the people.

Copperpix has state of the art development lab in India & United States with expertise in the conceptualization, development & implementation of marketing campaigns and mobile applications. With immensely creative and dedicated engineering and design team, we offer interactive Augmented Reality mobile marketing platform like PixAura (iOS & Android), PixAura+ (iOS) and ExplorAR (Android). These products enhances conventional media promotion by providing useful information, interactivity and two way dialogue between sellers and consumers. Being a novelty, Augmented Reality still has a charm to attract customers and create a buzz for the products.

CopperPix innovation journey has just begin, follow us to try new products before the rest of the world.
